description: This Dart source file defines the MarketProvider class, a state management provider for a Flutter app that handles fetching and managing stock market data, including top movers and alerts, utilizing external services and mocking fallback data.

classes.name: MarketProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier-based provider that manages stock data and alerts for the market dashboard.

methods.name: _loadInitial
methods.description: Private asynchronous method to load initial set of stock quotes, sorting and handling fallback to mock data.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Public asynchronous method to refresh current stock data and update the alerts.

methods.name: askAI
methods.description: Method to send a question about a stock symbol to a mock AI service and return the response.

methods.name: peers
methods.description: Returns a list of peer stocks, using current top movers or mock data if none are loaded.
